text:
Hi
        I am using TabLib which works fine for TomCat 4.0.3 and giving error on 
TomCat 4.1 and above.

Please help me to resolve the same. 
I am using the  taglib used for views which is reused from Professional-JSP-
J2EE-Edition code samples. 
name of the jar file for taglib is 'viewsclasses.jar'

text:
anybody found the solution..?? .. plz send me to hpatel@tfp.com.. i am in big 
problem right now.. Hitesh
creator: hpatel@tfp.com
yannc76@yahoo.de
text:
Try to disable TagPooling in $TOMCAT_INSTALL/conf/web.xml (a new feature for 
4.1.x) to see if the tag then works again. Otherwise, please provide a complete 
example with the sources of the tag(s).

Based on the comment - it looks like tag pooling. Otehrwise a test case must be
attached to this bug report with a description of how to reproduce. We will not
search for examples from a book.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
